item.title: Variety Honors 10 Comics To Watch at Just For Laughs Festival
item.description: After a year away, the Just For Laughs Comedy Festival returned to Montreal with a star-studded line-up of the biggest names in laughter. On July 24, Variety presented their annual 10 Comics To Watch

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”

item.title: Joseph Quinn Wants a Marvel Team-Up With Tom Holland: “He’s Our Best-Ever Spider-Man”
item.description: Quinn, who plays Johnny Storm/Human Torch in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps,’ joined Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby and Ebon Moss-Bachrach at their film’s L.A. premiere.

item.title: What Convinced Freddie Prinze Jr. to Return to ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’
item.description: Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt are back, alongside a younger cast of Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon.

item.description: Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt are back, alongside a younger cast of Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon.
